text: Anwar Hossain (1938 â€“ 17 August 2021) was a Bangladeshi businessman and politician. He was a member of the Jatiya Sangsad from 1988 until 1990. He was the founder and chairman of Anwar Group. He was a member of the Jatiya Party. Hossain was born in Lalbagh Thana, Bangladesh. Hossain died on 17 August 2021 in Dhaka, aged 83.Anwar Group Founder and Chairman Anwar Hossain no more ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Bangladeshi politicians Category:Bangladeshi Muslims Category:Bangladeshi businesspeople Category:People from Dhaka Category:4th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Anwar Hossain (industrialist)
